name: Better Call Saul
notes: A captivating prequel to Breaking Bad, filled with morally complex characters. Highly recommended!

name: Game of Thrones
notes: A rollercoaster of emotions with epic battles and unexpected twists. Must-watch for fantasy lovers!

name: The Flash
notes: While the speedster action is fun, the plot can be inconsistent. Suitable for superhero enthusiasts.

name: House of Dragon
notes: An intriguing Game of Thrones prequel, exploring the fascinating history of House Targaryen.

name: The Boys
notes: A dark and twisted take on superheroes. If you like subversive storytelling, this one's for you!

name: Invincible
notes: Balancing superhero action and family drama, it's a unique animated series worth checking out.

name: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters
notes: While the monster visuals are impressive, the plot might not satisfy everyone's taste.

name: The Big Bang Theory
notes: A hilarious sitcom for science and geek culture fans. Some episodes hit the mark better than others.

name: Breaking Bad
notes: An intense and gripping journey into the world of crime. One of the best TV shows ever made!
